text: The Girl Is Mine" is a song recorded by American singer Michael Jackson featuring English singer-songwriter and musician Paul McCartney, released in 1982 as part of Jackson's album Thriller. The song is notable for its blend of pop and rock elements and features a dialogue between Jackson and McCartney, where they argue over a girl they both claim to love. The track was a commercial success, reaching high positions on charts around the world and contributing to the iconic status of the Thriller album. ==References== Category:1982 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Rock ballads Category:Soft rock songs Category:Michael Jackson songs Category:Paul McCartney songs
title: The Girl Is Mine
